svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - February 17 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
February 17, 2024" date: "2024-02-16"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim : Dencun
upgrade client releases expected next week, followed by a mainnet shadow fork Retroactive EIP
proposals : EIP7610 (revert contract creation for non-empty storage) need to discuss Verkle
interaction and EIP7523 (deprecate empty accounts) need to verify no empty accounts Pectra upgrade
(small fork targeting late 2024) Discussions on potential EIPs: EIP5806 (delegate transaction),
alternative to EIP3074 EIP7557 (block-level warming) EIP2935 (historical block hashes in state)
updated for Verkle EIP5920 (PAY opcode) EIP7609 (decrease TLOAD/TSTORE base cost) Agreed to include
EIP2537 (BLS precompile)
Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim :
â€¢ Dencun upgrade client releases expected next week, followed by a mainnet shadow fork
Dencun upgrade client releases expected next week, followed by a mainnet shadow fork
â€¢ Retroactive EIP proposals : EIP7610 (revert contract creation for non-empty storage) need to discuss
Verkle interaction and EIP7523 (deprecate empty accounts) need to verify no empty accounts
Retroactive EIP proposals : EIP7610 (revert contract creation for non-empty storage) need to discuss
â€¢ Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) Discussions on potential EIPs: EIP5806 (delegate
transaction), alternative to EIP3074 EIP7557 (block-level warming) EIP2935 (historical block hashes in
state) updated for Verkle EIP5920 (PAY opcode) EIP7609 (decrease TLOAD/TSTORE base cost) Agreed to
include EIP2537 (BLS precompile)
Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024)
â€¢ Discussions on potential EIPs: EIP5806 (delegate transaction), alternative to EIP3074 EIP7557
(block-level warming) EIP2935 (historical block hashes in state) updated for Verkle EIP5920 (PAY
opcode) EIP7609 (decrease TLOAD/TSTORE base cost)
Discussions on potential EIPs:
â€¢ EIP5806 (delegate transaction), alternative to EIP3074
EIP5806 (delegate transaction), alternative to EIP3074
â€¢ EIP7557 (block-level warming)
EIP7557 (block-level warming)
â€¢ EIP2935 (historical block hashes in state) updated for Verkle
EIP2935 (historical block hashes in state) updated for Verkle
â€¢ EIP5920 (PAY opcode)
EIP5920 (PAY opcode)
â€¢ EIP7609 (decrease TLOAD/TSTORE base cost)
EIP7609 (decrease TLOAD/TSTORE base cost)
â€¢ Agreed to include EIP2537 (BLS precompile)
Agreed to include EIP2537 (BLS precompile)
â€¢ consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.7 : schedule mainnet Dencun upgrade
consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.7 : schedule mainnet Dencun upgrade
Osaka upgrade (meta EIP7607 )
â€¢ Verkle implementers call video & notes : updates from client teams & testing team, EIP2935 updated,
new EIP7612 and deprecating serialize commitment
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.69% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.69% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 69% supermajority, could cause a
chain split Lidoâ€™s use of supermajority client continues to put Ethereum at risk Supermajority
dashboard : simulate Lido operators changing to minority clients Consensus layer: Prysm 38% , any
client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth 69% supermajority, could cause a chain split Lidoâ€™s use of supermajority
client continues to put Ethereum at risk Supermajority dashboard : simulate Lido operators changing to
minority clients
Execution layer: Geth 69% supermajority, could cause a chain split
â€¢ Lidoâ€™s use of supermajority client continues to put Ethereum at risk
Lidoâ€™s use of supermajority client continues to put Ethereum at risk
â€¢ Supermajority dashboard : simulate Lido operators changing to minority clients
Supermajority dashboard : simulate Lido operators changing to minority clients
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 38% , any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 38% , any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ Local shadowforks with single line command using Kurtosis over Docker or Kubernetes
Local shadowforks with single line command using Kurtosis over Docker or Kubernetes
â€¢ Erb (blob archive files) design decisions, store blobs alongside Era archive files
Erb (blob archive files) design decisions, store blobs alongside Era archive files
â€¢ Inclusion list breakout call video & notes from Terence
Inclusion list breakout call video & notes from Terence
ePBS (enshrined Proposer-Builder Separation)
â€¢ ePBS breakout call video & notes from Terence
ePBS breakout call video & notes from Terence
â€¢ Terence: minimal ePBS Beacon chain changes
Terence: minimal ePBS Beacon chain changes
â€¢ Francesco: options to harden PBS without full enshrinement
Francesco: options to harden PBS without full enshrinement
MEV
â€¢ MMASim : MEV-Boost auction simulation framework
MMASim : MEV-Boost auction simulation framework
â€¢ predictive MEV-burn : proposal to incentivize builders to predict a blocks value
predictive MEV-burn : proposal to incentivize builders to predict a blocks value
â€¢ Leaderless auctions : decentralized MEV-resistant auction with no auctioneer
Leaderless auctions : decentralized MEV-resistant auction with no auctioneer
Research
â€¢ Barnabe: rainbow staking , framework for protocol service providers (professional operators & solo
stakers) to participate in spectrum of heavy (slashable) & light (non/partially slashable) services
For stakers
â€¢ Blobs use max 103 GiB (average 50 GiB) plus the blob pool
Client releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Teku v24.2.0 : mainnet Dencun upgrade
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Teku v24.2.0 : mainnet Dencun upgrade
â€¢ Execution layer: Besu v24.1.2 : mainnet Dencun upgrade Nethermind v1.25.4 : mainnet Dencun upgrade
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.18 : mainnet Dencun upgrade and trie performance improvements
Execution layer:
â€¢ Besu v24.1.2 : mainnet Dencun upgrade
Besu v24.1.2 : mainnet Dencun upgrade
â€¢ Nethermind v1.25.4 : mainnet Dencun upgrade
Nethermind v1.25.4 : mainnet Dencun upgrade
â€¢ Reth v0.1.0-alpha.18 : mainnet Dencun upgrade and trie performance improvements
Support the Roman Storm & Alex Pertsev legal defense fund
The Biden administration is attempting to criminalize open source software development as part of its
war on crypto.
The fundraiser ends THIS WEEK. Donate to defend our innocent Ethereum heroes .
Layer 2
â€¢ Ed Felten: blobs explainer for L2 users , transactions will be cheaper (unknown by how much)
Ed Felten: blobs explainer for L2 users , transactions will be cheaper (unknown by how much)
â€¢ RollCall (L2 standards) call video and notes : L2s generally plan to use blobs soon after Dencun
upgrade, recap of breakout calls and proposed RIP7614 (expose call stack to contracts)
RollCall (L2 standards) call video and notes : L2s generally plan to use blobs soon after Dencun
â€¢ Based rollups: Sequencing & pre-confirmations call video Justin Drake answers shared sequencing
concerns
Based rollups:
â€¢ Sequencing & pre-confirmations call video
Sequencing & pre-confirmations call video
â€¢ Justin Drake answers shared sequencing concerns
Justin Drake answers shared sequencing concerns
â€¢ Starknet airdrop claimable from Feb 20, includes pre-Merge stakers, Protocol Guild, EIP/ERC authors
and contributors to Ethereum repos, US not eligible
Starknet airdrop claimable from Feb 20, includes pre-Merge stakers, Protocol Guild, EIP/ERC authors
â€¢ ApeChain to use Arbitrum
ApeChain to use Arbitrum
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs: EIP7620 : EOF - Contract creation instructions EIP7623 : Increase calldata cost
EIPs:
â€¢ EIP7620 : EOF - Contract creation instructions
EIP7620 : EOF - Contract creation instructions
â€¢ EIP7623 : Increase calldata cost
EIP7623 : Increase calldata cost
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7621 : Basket token ERC7622 : Pre-authorized service payment protocol
ERC7624 : Dynamic identity binding soulbound tokens
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7621 : Basket token
ERC7621 : Basket token
â€¢ ERC7622 : Pre-authorized service payment protocol
ERC7622 : Pre-authorized service payment protocol
â€¢ ERC7624 : Dynamic identity binding soulbound tokens
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Foundry: test & trace performance improvements , forge test up to 6x faster Sphinx : DevOps platform
to deploy & manage contracts
Foundry:
â€¢ test & trace performance improvements , forge test up to 6x faster
test & trace performance improvements , forge test up to 6x faster
â€¢ Sphinx : DevOps platform to deploy & manage contracts
Sphinx : DevOps platform to deploy & manage contracts
â€¢ Hardhat: v2.20.0 : adds Cancun support (enable in config), blob transactions not yet supported
Account Abstraction plugin : send sponsored transactions on testnets
Hardhat:
â€¢ v2.20.0 : adds Cancun support (enable in config), blob transactions not yet supported
v2.20.0 : adds Cancun support (enable in config), blob transactions not yet supported
â€¢ Account Abstraction plugin : send sponsored transactions on testnets
â€¢ Remix v0.43.0 : adds tool icons on hover in the file explorer, Vyper compiler displays errors in
cards and plugins from external teams have warning icon
Remix v0.43.0 : adds tool icons on hover in the file explorer, Vyper compiler displays errors in cards
and plugins from external teams have warning icon
â€¢ VSCode Solidity Inspector v1.3 adds inline file import suggestions with Foundry remapping support
VSCode Solidity Inspector v1.3 adds inline file import suggestions with Foundry remapping support
â€¢ DN404 (Solidity contract): hybrid ERC20 & ERC721, mints/burns NFTs based on ERC20 balance
DN404 (Solidity contract): hybrid ERC20 & ERC721, mints/burns NFTs based on ERC20 balance
â€¢ Intents Engine : natural language command interface for contracts
Intents Engine : natural language command interface for contracts
â€¢ Czip : calldata compression/decompression in Huff
Czip : calldata compression/decompression in Huff
â€¢ Slitherin (custom Slither detectors) v0.6 : adds arithmetic overflow detector & Arbitrum detectors
Slitherin (custom Slither detectors) v0.6 : adds arithmetic overflow detector & Arbitrum detectors
â€¢ Sourcify: finding auxdata in bytecode for partial source code verification
Sourcify: finding auxdata in bytecode for partial source code verification
â€¢ Vyper JupyterLab & Google Colab integration updated to use browser wallet network directly
Vyper JupyterLab & Google Colab integration updated to use browser wallet network directly
â€¢ RainbowKit v2 : EIP6963 support, wagmi v2, multiple wallet connection sessions and TanStack Query
support
RainbowKit v2 : EIP6963 support, wagmi v2, multiple wallet connection sessions and TanStack Query
â€¢ TrueBlocks Key : index API, beta
TrueBlocks Key : index API, beta
â€¢ OpenZeppelin Ethernaut CTF March 16-17
OpenZeppelin Ethernaut CTF March 16-17
Security
â€¢ Security Alliance (SEAL): draft whitehat Safe Harbor framework
Ecosystem
â€¢ Mike Neuder & Alex Stokes: rollup-centric roadmap
Mike Neuder & Alex Stokes: rollup-centric roadmap
â€¢ Data visualization of Optimism RetroPGF3 ballots
Data visualization of Optimism RetroPGF3 ballots
Job Listings
â€¢ MetaMask Staking: Staff Software Engineer and Software Engineer
MetaMask Staking: Staff Software Engineer and Software Engineer
â€¢ Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
â€¢ EF seek an Executive Assistant to support senior decision makers
EF seek an Executive Assistant to support senior decision makers
â€¢ Sourcify seek a TypeScript Developer
Sourcify seek a TypeScript Developer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 13.2 to 477.5 gwei, with 34.9 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 22.3 gwei 6.9k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 13.2 to 477.5 gwei, with 34.9 gwei average
â€¢ Zero net issuance currently at 22.3 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.3 gwei
â€¢ 6.9k ETH net burn this week
6.9k ETH net burn this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,476 - $2,859, currently $2,798
ETHUSD : $2,476 - $2,859, currently $2,798
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Uniswap v4 planned for Q3
Uniswap v4 planned for Q3
â€¢ ENS eth.link $300k settlement offer by Manifold Finance
ENS eth.link $300k settlement offer by Manifold Finance
â€¢ Onthis USDC shortcuts : send to ENS shortcut to bridge to L2
Onthis USDC shortcuts : send to ENS shortcut to bridge to L2
â€¢ Superfluid distribution pools : one to many streams
Superfluid distribution pools : one to many streams
â€¢ Privacy & Scaling Explorations: Anon Aadhaar v1
Privacy & Scaling Explorations: Anon Aadhaar v1
General
â€¢ GoFundMe canceled Roman Storm & Alex Pertsev fundraiser, donate using crypto
GoFundMe canceled Roman Storm & Alex Pertsev fundraiser, donate using crypto
â€¢ Breaking BFT : total cost of attack estimated at $34B for Ethereum & $5-22B for Bitcoin
Breaking BFT : total cost of attack estimated at $34B for Ethereum & $5-22B for Bitcoin
â€¢ Skiff sunsetting products, acquired by Notion
Skiff sunsetting products, acquired by Notion
â€¢ Polygon PoS log parsing vulnerability disclosed , patched
Polygon PoS log parsing vulnerability disclosed , patched
â€¢ FRIDA : data availability sampling from FRI
FRIDA : data availability sampling from FRI
